title: Trace: Kasouken Houi Kenkyuuin no Tsuisou
original_name: トレース 科捜研法医研究員の追想
sinopse:
A crime suspense story set in a forensic laboratory where specialists work to uncover clues from seemingly insignificant bits of trace evidence. The story begins when Nonna Sawaguchi, a rookie forensic researcher, meets Reiji Mano, the man who solved her parents' murder case.

(Source: ANN)
